# WEBVAM Studio

> Web development studio based in Kladno, Czech Republic. We build websites for Czech businesses, expats, and the Russian-speaking and Ukrainian communities in Czechia.

## About

WEBVAM Studio is a web development agency run by Igor Gricyk (IČO: 10681221). We specialize in fast, secure websites for small businesses and entrepreneurs in the Czech Republic. We communicate in Czech, Russian, Ukrainian, and English.

## Services

- Static websites (Hugo): from 15,000 CZK — fast, secure sites with Google PageSpeed 95-100
- CMS websites (WordPress): from 20,000 CZK — e-commerce, blogs, content management
- SEO optimization: from 5,000 CZK — Google and Seznam rankings, local SEO
- Support & maintenance: from 1,500 CZK/month — updates, backups, security
- Domain & hosting: from 500 CZK/month — .cz domains, SSL, professional email

## Location

Kladno, Czech Republic (serving Prague and all of Czech Republic)

## Contact

- Email: info@webvam.cz
- Phone: +420 773 212 221
- Website: https://webvam.cz/
- GitHub: https://github.com/gricyk

## Languages

This website is available in:
- Czech (default): https://webvam.cz/
- Russian: https://webvam.cz/ru/
- Ukrainian: https://webvam.cz/uk/
- English: https://webvam.cz/en/

## Portfolio

We have built websites for: B-UHR (watch e-shop), Bedneni.org (nonprofit), Elite Residence (real estate), Hostivice Food (restaurant), PocketWatch Adaptor (collector e-shop), Richard Star (personal portfolio), Spasenie.eu (church website), TruckHelp&Go (trucking services).
